short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly cleans the spacing around punctuation in the selected editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleans up selected plain text or the entire plain text editor. Works only with vk.com and www.mytextarea.com, because allowing it to work anywhere would require a check done by the Chrome Extension team.
